mapper.select: select reserv_seq, shop_name, staff_nickname, style_name, reserv_request, reserv_date, reserv_time from t_reservation a inner join t_hairshop b on a.shop_seq = b.shop_seq inner join t_staff c on a.staff_seq = c.staff_seq inner join t_hairstyle d on a.style_seq = d.style_seq where cust_seq = #{cust_seq} and concat(reserv_date, ' ', reserv_time) > now() and reserv_stat = 0 order by reserv_date, reserv_time
mapper.update: update t_reservation set reserv_stat=2 where reserv_seq=#{reserv_seq}
